name: Goa
description: Famous for beaches, churches, nightlife, and seafood.

travel.flight: Dabolim Airport connects major Indian cities.
travel.train: Madgaon and Vasco-da-Gama stations are the main railway hubs.
travel.bus: KSRTC and private buses from Mumbai, Pune, and Bangalore.
travel.car: Approx. 10 hours drive from Mumbai via NH66.

name: Ooty
description: Known for tea gardens, lakes, and misty hills of the Nilgiris.

travel.bus: Frequent buses from Bangalore, Coimbatore, and Mysore.

name: Kerala
description: Backwaters, Ayurveda, beaches, and green hills — truly God's Own Country.

travel.flight: Airports in Kochi, Trivandrum, and Calicut.
travel.train: Excellent rail network across the state.
travel.bus: KSRTC and private buses connect all districts.

name: Jaipur
description: The Pink City of India — rich in heritage, forts, and culture.

travel.flight: Jaipur International Airport connects to Delhi and Mumbai.
travel.train: Jaipur Junction connects to all major Indian cities.
travel.bus: Comfortable AC buses from Delhi and Agra.
travel.car: 4-5 hrs drive from Delhi via NH48.

name: Manali
description: A scenic hill station in Himachal Pradesh, famous for snow and adventure.

travel.train: Joginder Nagar is the closest railway station.
travel.bus: HRTC and private Volvo buses from Delhi & Chandigarh.
travel.car: 12-hour drive from Delhi with beautiful mountain views.
